commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I've finished my story, Prez. I want you to be the first to hear it... Would that be okay with you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It would be my honor, Shizuku.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Then I'll begin. This is the story of a young girl...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The young girl's heart was filled with hopes for tomorrow. Tomorrow, she would put on a performance she'd always dreamed of.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Though of course, she did have her worries. All sorts of concerns prickled at her mind. What would she do if she messed up? What would she do if it didn't go well?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: "I knew you hadn't lost your passion for being a school idol!"

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: With those words and a brilliant smile, all the girl's worries vanished without a trace. It was then...that my life began anew.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: This is a place where each of us can express ourselves the way we want to, and follow the path we want to.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There really is no better way to describe the new School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Though the people around me have very different goals, they're all focused intently on the future they want, just like I am.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There by our side was someone who always gave us strength and supported us.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: In this world, I'm able to be a bit more selfish and play the roles I want to play.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There are so many school idols that shine bright in my imagination. The playful little prankster. The cool and confident type. The mysterious type.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There are countless school idols within me that are just dying to be seen.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Can I ever play them all?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's not a question. I WILL play them all. And I want to tell all of you about it!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What kind of school idol will I play tomorrow? What kind of life will I perform?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Our stories fill the pages of these empty notebooks. These stories will become our future. They will be the scripts of tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: This world is my stage! It's up to me what sort of character I'll be and how I live. My life will be how I want it to be!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: This is a formal challenge, from the scriptwriter I am today to the leading lady I'll be tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Can you play that type of school idol?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Can you fill the stage with your smile?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: "Of course I can!" I'll respond with a confident boom.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But deep down, I know I'll still have some of those doubts pricking at my heart.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They'll always be trying to drown my heart in their darkness!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Whenever I sense that, I just have to remember one simple thing.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I remember the person who reached out and pulled me back into the world of school idols and acting that I'd always loved.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: When I took her hand, those doubts turned to excitement.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: "No matter what happens, I'll be there for all of you! I'll do everything in my power to support you!"

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I just remember the warmth in her hand.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's why I act to this day. It's why I can tell you about the most magnificent school idol I have in my heart.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Phew... So, what did you think? Did my story touch your heart?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-Wow! It was amazing, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hehe, I'm really glad!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I got chills. It was so true to life.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Giggle* Well, those are my true and honest feelings.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you the main character in your live reading?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hmm... I guess you could say that, but it's not 100% accurate. It's kind of me, but it's kind of not.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Got it.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But it's definitely a story that allows me to live vicariously through the beginning of it all, any time I want.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know it's just a story, but it still makes me happy to hear. Okay, let's make a song that'll go perfectly with your reading! Then you can let everyone in the fan club hear!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Okay!
